description: When attempting to import the scipy module, a FileNotFoundError is thrown due to the inability to locate the scipy files on the system. This could be caused by the incorrect installation of scipy or the incorrect referencing of the scipy files in the system's
code:
import scipy
import numpy as np

# Generate random array of size 10
arr = np.random.randint(10, size=10)

# Calculate the mean, median and standard deviation
mean = np.mean(arr)
